attributes.action: MP'S to serve for no more than 10 years.
attributes.additional_details: 17.4million people voted to leave the EU, a majority, but a majority of the MP's want to remain in the EU and have worked to stop the referendum result being auctioned.
attributes.background: The referendum has clearly shown that the career politicians are significantly out of touch with the very people that they are supposed to represent.  I now believe that MP's should be restricted to a maximum of 2 terms/10 years. This will refresh parliament and keep it up to date and in touch.
